Ideas for a secure Linux Desktop

  • Don’t need to port full ChromeOS, we just need proper sandboxing for Chrome and system daemons (minijail, cgroups, etc…)
  • Single user system
  • Stateless configuration (a la Clear Linux)
  • Read only rootfs by default
  • Managed application state/cache in containers
  • Mandatory Access Controls
  • Uses s6 for init, uses the single user to it’s advantage by scheduling every single program on the system via s6
  • NixOS style filesystem namespacing
  • Probably built off of Alpine linux to start
